altername_name: Mario & Sonic op de Olympische Winterspelen
Mario y Sonic en los Juegos Olímpicos de Invierno
瑪利歐與音速小子在溫哥華冬季奧林匹克運動會
name: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games
overview: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games will take players to Vancouver, Canada, host city of the official 2010 Olympic Winter Games. This gaming experience invites players of all ages and skill sets to face-off in some of the most intense winter competitions. The Nintendo DS brings an intense competitive element using the Nintendo DS wireless capabilities.
